content.text:
Artist: IZ or Israel Kamakawiwoole (original from Wizard of OZ)
Song: Somewhere Over The Rainbow
Tabbed by Shigewara (AGSNOR tabs akselst@hotmail.com)
Play with this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V1bFr2SWP1I

This is my first tab ever. I hope all is correct. If not please tell.

Format:
Listen to song on youtube..

Capo 7th if you don't want to play all the chords barre like I do, 
otherwise transpose up 7 frets and remove the capo. After transposing 
up 7 steps you can choose wether to play the standard chords, or barre.

It was also suggested to me that you can play it with capo on 5th fret
and transpose up 2 steps. This way you will start with the chord of G.
Many find it easier to play it this way, so check it out.
